column4: Hi! I have an old laptop(800mhz, 512mb ram, 14gb hdd). WinXP is really SLOW, would Ubuntu be a good option? Could this computer do as a surf computer?
that may be a tad sluggish under ubuntu. You may want to try some of the Ultra-light linux distros.
ive ran ubuntu on a 600mhz celleron. so it can do it. Just dont expect any heavy apps to be speedy it should web surf fine.
